full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/27/2023 Dollars Certificate Number $2,000.00 Savings D 305 Incorporated under the laws of the State of Utah Series Number of Shares APRIL, 1924. 20 Inbestors Guaranteed Sabings Certificate This is to Certify THAT in consideration of the payment of $50.40, payable in one hundred eighty equal installments of $0.28 for each $100.00 represented by this Certificate, payable in advance on or before the first day of each month for the full term of one hundred eighty months from the first day of APRIL 192..4 to the Treasurer of this , Association at Salt Lake City, Utah, that BRUNO MAREZ of DIVIDEND, UTAH is the owner of 20 Shares of Investors Guaranteed Dividend Stock of the matured value of $ 2,000.00 that one hundred eighty months after the date of the initial payment, as above stated, and not otherwise, the COLUMBIA SAVINGS & LOAN ASSOCIATION promises to repay at its offices in Salt Lake City, Utah, to the then legal holder of this Certificate, all payments so made, and 8% interest per annum, compounded semi-annually, together with all profits standing to the credit of this Certificate. But in lieu of such payments, at the option of the then legal holder, the COLUMBIA SAVINGS & LOAN ASSOCIATION will pay such holder the sum of $2,000.00 at the maturity of said Certificate as provided by the Articles of Incorporation, the By-laws and the records of this Association. .This Certificate is issued by the Association and is accepted by the holder hereof subject to the privileges, terms and conditions specified on the second page hereof and also subject to the provisions of the Articles of Incorporation and the By-laws of the Association, all of which are hereby referred to and made a part hereof as fully as if set forth by the face of this Certificate. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Columbia Savings & Loan Association has caused this certificate to be exe- cuted in its corporate name and its corporate seal SEAL affixed at Salt Lake City, Utah, this 18th day of SEPTEMBER , 192.4 COLUMBIA SAVINGS & LOAN ASSOCIATION, Attest: Byx Secretary. al Cassity President Vice President." This security is issued by permission of the Securities Commission of Utah, which does not endorse or recommend the purchase of this or any other security.
